files.description: Canonical QA gate entrypoint that attempts containerized execution first and transparently falls back to a no-container failsafe mode while always writing logs and partial results to /outputs/qa.

Summary: Wrote qa_gate.py implementing a docker-first QA gate with automatic failsafe fallback and structured artifact logging to outputs/qa.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa/qa_gate.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/qa/qa_gate.py"]
Summary: Added a docker-first QA gate entrypoint that always writes artifacts and falls back to a deterministic local failsafe mode on container failure.

files.description: Docker-based QA execution helper that runs the intended full QA command in a container, captures stdout/stderr and exit codes, and detects container-loss scenarios for failsafe triggering.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa/docker_runner.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/qa/docker_runner.py", "scripts/qa/qa_gate.py"]
Summary: Added a compact docker QA runner helper that captures stdout/stderr/exit, supports timeouts, and flags container-loss conditions for downstream failsafe triggering.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa/docker_runner.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/qa/docker_runner.py", "scripts/qa/qa_gate.py"]
Summary: Added a Docker QA execution helper that captures stdout/stderr/exit codes, detects likely container-loss conditions, and supports log file writes for failsafe triggering.

files.description: No-container failsafe QA runner that executes a reduced, deterministic test subset locally with strict timeouts and structured error capture to ensure logs and partial results are produced.

Summary: Wrote a deterministic, timeout-bound failsafe QA runner that always emits structured artifacts and combined logs for partial results.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/qa/failsafe_runner.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/qa/docker_runner.py", "scripts/qa/failsafe_runner.py", "scripts/qa/qa_gate.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a standalone no-container failsafe QA runner that executes a deterministic reduced local test plan with strict timeouts and always writes structured logs and partial results.

files.description: Utility module for creating /outputs/qa directories and writing standardized artifacts (run metadata, logs, partial results, and error reports) in a consistent schema.

SUMMARY: Added a compact artifacts utility module to create outputs/qa run directories and write standardized metadata, logs, partial results, errors, and a latest-run index.

missionDescription: Create a focused remediation patch that adds a 'no-container/failsafe execution mode' to the QA runner scripts (e.g., graceful degradation, reduced test set, clear error capture) so that execution does not terminate with 'container lost' without producing logs and partial results; document the run command in /outputs/qa/RUN_INSTRUCTIONS.md.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Current execution repeatedly aborts before testing any files, yielding zero outputs. A failsafe mode that guarantees logs/partials is necessary to progress under unstable execution conditions.
projectName: focused remediation patch that adds a 'no-container/failsafe execution mode' to the QA runner
